summary.Title: Cyber Security Team Lead
summary.Presentation: If you love working with embedded security solutions in Operation Technology (OT) environments and have a business and quality-oriented mindset, you could be exactly who we are looking for!

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
If you love working with embedded security solutions in Operation Technology (OT) environments and have a business and quality-oriented mindset, you could be exactly who we are looking for!

In Prevas we are expanding our Cyber Security Team. Our focus is on analysing, advising, implementing and maintaining security related issues for our embedded hardware and software customers. We work with medical devices, Industrial controllers and IoT with different connectivity and placed in critical infrastructures as well as standard consumer networks.

You are experienced with most of the following:

  • Market understanding within Embedded Cyber Security consultancy
  • Cyber Security Risk Assessment / Quality Assurance
    • Facilitation of a CSRA
    • Methods for analysing risks and finding vulnerabilities in architecture and designs
    • Knowledge about security vulnerabilities CVE's, exploits methods etc.
    • Experience with penetration test is a plus
  • Knowledge about and experience with industrial cyber security standards, e.g.:
    • IEC 62443-4-1/2
    • UL 2900
  • Team-lead
    • Staff management, Project management, etc.
  • Architecture and design with Cyber Security design principles, e.g.
    • Minimize Attack Surface Area, Least Privilege, Separation of Duties, Defense in Depth
  • General knowledge about the difference between IT and OT networks
  • Experience with architecture and design of secure embedded devices would be considered a bonus.

The Cyber Security Team is a cross-region team in Prevas and your place of work could be either in Aarhus, Herlev or Aalborg depending on where you live.

About Prevas

We are embedded in our DNA and we are focused on being the preferred provider of embedded development to our customers. We often work very closely with our customers, and as Prevas employee, you will often come into close contact with many different customers’ development departments, either as project member at our office, or on-site in the customer’s development team.

We have an informal corporate culture with great opportunity for influence as well as great opportunities for personal- and competence development in some of the industry’s most exciting and challenging development projects. We believe that a balance between work and private life is a prerequisite for efficiency and creativity in the office.

If you have a passion for embedded cyber security, please send us an application. We will continuously be conducting interviews. If you need more information or you have questions, please contact VP Technology Peter Aagaard Kristensen, via e-mail: peter.kristensen@prevas.dk or tel: +45 51 54 33 66.
